reviews.text: Food ghere is pretty good. Dcent value, decent portions and tied into a historical building. Makes for a nice atmosphere if you eat before the bar crowd arrives next door. Parking is a beast here if crowded. The waitresses have all been very friendly on all visits. I do recommend the place, just make sure you are ready for the bar if after 6.
reviews.title: Historic place, Bar next door can get boisterous.
